name: Fat Prisoner Simulator 2
description: Fat Prisoner Simulator 2 is a fighting simulator with realistic physics where you are going to play the role of a prisoner during a jailhouse riot. All you can see around is crazy prisoners attacking everybody there. Even the guards are afraid to interfere as the situation seems really serious. Your task is to survive at any cost. Hit everyone you see and try not to miss a single blow, for any of those missed blows may cost you your life!
